main.name: Babies
main.explain: You like to interact with babies between the newborn stage and the age of 2.

main.name: Toddlers
main.explain: You like to interact with children between the ages of 2 and 5.

main.name: Primary school children
main.explain: You like to interact with children between the ages of 6 and 13.

main.name: High school children
main.explain: You like to interact with children between the ages of 13 and 19.

main.name: Students
main.explain: You like to interact young adults that are between the ages of 19 and 24.

main.name: Teenagers
main.explain: You like to interact with children between the ages of 13 and 19.

main.name: People in need
main.explain: You like to interact with people who have some or other need.

main.name: Working people
main.explain: You like to interact with people who are currently in a career.

main.name: Married people
main.explain: You like to interact with people who are currently married.

main.name: Older people
main.explain: You like to interact with senior citizens.

main.name: The handicapped
main.explain: You like to interact with people who are physically and/or mentally handicapped.

main.name: Addicted people
main.explain: You like to interact with people who are addicted to a substance.

main.name: The homeless
main.explain: You like to interact with people who have no refuge.

main.name: Men
main.explain: You like to interact with males.

main.name: Women
main.explain: You like to interact with females.

main.name: To be on my own
main.explain: You do not like to interact with people in general.
